experiments.name: contact_memory_en

game_instances.prompt: What is the first name of the person who likes studying history?
What is the last name of the person who likes cooking?
What is the last name of the person works for Baowu?
What is the last name of the person works for Apple?
What is the first name of the person who likes diy projects?

experiments.initial_prompt:
Your task is to remember person contact information including first name, last name, work, email, as well as hobbies and physical attributes. Important: You have to remember contact information for many people. 

Here is some information about a person that I need you to remember:

First Name: Ronald
Last Name: Gomez
Email: ronald.gomez@163.com
Work: BMW Group
Hobby: Studying history
Physical Traits: a Square jawline

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

First Name: Emily
Last Name: Phillips
Email: emilyphillips@foxmail.com
Work: Bank of America
Hobby: Cooking
Clothing: Beige chinos

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

First Name: Nicholas
Last Name: Wright
Email: wright.nicholas@tutamail.com
Work: Baowu
Hobby: Watching movies
Clothing: Beige trench coat

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

First Name: Steven
Last Name: Bailey
Email: stevenbailey@yahoo.de
Work: Apple
Hobby: Playing video games
Clothing: Blue tie

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

First Name: Joyce
Last Name: Hill
Email: hill.joyce@yahoo.co.kr
Work: Microsoft
Hobby: DIY projects


Please answer the following: $PROMPT$ Do not answer in a complete sentence. Only give the information requested.
